Carrot on a Stick on a Drew Goodname

description.english: Once upon a time a member of The Snommunity, Wonky Mollusk, drew a picture of these ducks. They had drawn them that way since childhood. Kaker, another member of The Snommunity, asked if they could make a 3D model of it. After doing so, I asked if I could put the duck in the game. After adding some sound effects and brainstorming a name for the ducks, Drew Goodname was born. Because there are three of them, we refer to their little family simply as The Goodnames. Today we grace The Goodnames with eternal carrot motivation (3D model created by Gochna). You keep on quackin', Goodnames.

displayName.english: ...but we do have these stylish hats!
